name: Hum 2gether Free
description:
** CHRISTMAS BONUS! GET THE CHRISTMAS GENRE FREE! **

Are you a fan of music? Do you enjoy humming along to tunes with your friends? Let's Hum 2gether!

Hum 2gether is a music game where you play a tune for a friend and they have to guess what song you've composed.

Choose a Song:
Start a game with your friend or a random player and you are presented with a few songs. Feel free to filter them by Genre for extra fun. Choose your favorite and continue...

Play a Song:
Armed with an arsenal of instruments, compose the song so it is recognizable. Then submit the song to your friend...

Guess a Song:
When your friend has finished composing a song, you receive it and attempt to guess the title, "hang-man" style. If you manage to guess correctly, you receive coins!

Enjoy Hum 2gether! And please outline any requests in the comments. We are a very small team (3) and are excited to hear any feedback you have.

** CHRISTMAS BONUS! GET THE CHRISTMAS GENRE FREE! **
